info.title: Some things I've made
info.summary: and I like to make stuff for the web in my free time (and sometimes for work). This is a portfolio of my favourite things I've made.

items.name: Quest Journal
items.desc: This is a task manager app in the style of a video game quest menu. It uses a REST API Node.js server I made.

items.name: D3 Research Report
items.desc: Some research I did for my old job. I made an HTML report with interactive charts.

items.name: This website
items.desc: Do you like it? I made it with React.js and Skeleton CSS.

items.name: Game WIP
items.desc: A game engine I'm developing to make point and click adventure games.

items.name: Keyboard
items.desc: This is a keyboard you can play with your computer keyboard. It's very simple (so far).

items.name: Mosaic Morph
items.desc: This is a tool that takes one image and splits it into segments to draw a 'mosaic' of another image.

items.name: Text Art
items.desc: This is a tool that takes some text and draws an image with that text.
